Title: Circular’s new smart ring has a built-in ECG
Description:
Until today, I could count on one finger the amount of smart rings that offered a one-line ECG in such a small package.
Bodimetrics’ Circul+ debuted in 2021, but what it had in heart-monitoring features it lacked in style, or even looking like a real ring.
To…

Title: CES 2025: Lutron Debuts HomeKit-Compatible Caséta Smart Shades
Description:
Lutron today announced the launch of new Caséta Smart Shades that are able to integrate with HomeKit and other smart home platforms.
Priced at $399, the Caséta shades can be controlled using schedules, in-wall controls, remotes, the Lutron app, the Home app, …

Title: Apple Fitness+ Progressive Strength Training Program Now Available
Description:
Apple Fitness+ introduced new workout programs today.
The previously announced lineup of content includes a new progressive strength training program designed to take the guesswork out of putting together the perfect routine, along with a conditioning program…

Title: Getting Sober-curious: why your friends (and maybe you) are going dry.
Description:
According to Pew – 79% of New Year's resolutions are about one thing: health.
It's Been a Minute is kicking off 2025 with a little series called "new year, new me." We're getting into some of the big questions and cultural confusion around our health and well…

Title: Dr. Rachel Levine focused on her job at HHS. Still, anti-trans politics followed her
Description:
Dr.
Rachel Levine is the highest ranking, out transgender person ever to serve in the federal government.
Her tenure at HHS ran concurrent with an explosion in state legislation targeting transgender people.

Title: Pictures of Odesa, as it tangles with a complex web of Russian and Ukrainian heritage
Description: Photographer Michael Robinson Chávez visits a city in Ukraine that was partly famous as a site for Russian travelers and intellectuals, but since 2022 has come under Russian attack.

Title: Jimmy Carter Remembered Fondly by Bill Gates, Environmentalists
Description:
As America begins a six-day state funeral for former president Jimmy Carter, Microsoft co-founder/philanthropist Bill Gates shared "my fondest memory" this week.
"He and Rosalynn were among my first and most inspiring role models in global health." They play…

Title: Klarna's CEO says AI is capable of doing his job — and it makes him feel 'gloomy'
Description: Sebastian Siemiatkowski said he's "not necessarily super excited" about AI being capable of doing his job as CEO of Klarna.

Title: I turned down a vice-president job that only offered 10 days off a year. As a mom of 2, I need more flexibility.
Description:
Sherri Carpineto was offered a vice president role.
She turned it down because it only offered 10 days off per year for vacation and sick time.

Title: Ukraine's big new strategy to relieve its manpower crunch isn't working, top war analyst says
Description: Ukrainian leadership said in May that it wanted 10 new brigades, but they've largely proven to be ineffective in combat, Michael Kofman wrote.

Title: Sam Altman says these 2 'legendary' execs were 'in the foxhole' with him during his brief ouster from OpenAI
Description: "Ron Conway and Brian Chesky went so far above and beyond the call of duty that I'm not even sure how to describe it," Altman wrote in his blog.

Title: Meet the leaders of the Big 4, who jointly employ 1.5 million staff
Description:
PwC, Deloitte, EY, and KPMG are the four biggest accounting and consulting firms in the world.
These are the leaders who run them.

Title: Lymow unveils smart robotic mower with mulching blades and tracked threads
Description: Lymow said the Lymow One is the world's first smart robotic mower with mulching blades and tracked threads.

Title: Around the World on the Hudson River
Description: After eighty thousand miles, John Lipscomb takes his final patrol as a Riverkeeper boat captain who stumped for the fish and fought the “shit sprinklers,” Ben McGrath writes.

Title: Lauren Boebert’s Survival Instincts
Description:
After barely winning the 2022 election in Colorado’s Third District, the congresswoman with a Trumpist far-right national image experienced personal troubles, including an infamous date at a performance of “Beetlejuice,” and moved to a different district.
Pet…

Title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
Description:
Gottfried Leibniz made conceptual advances that lie behind our digital world.
Yet for centuries he was mocked for a misstep.

Title: How to watch AMD’s CES 2025 keynote today
Description:
AMD's CES 2025 keynote is just around the corner.
Here's how to watch, so you can stay up to date on new RDNA4 GPUs, Ryzen CPUs, and more.

Title: I fell in love with the new Samsung 3D Monitor, but one big question remains
Description:
I tried out the latest version of Samsung's Odyssey 3D gaming monitor, and was highly impressed.
But game support may be an uphill battle.

Title: Magic Links Have Rough Edges, but Passkeys Can Smooth Them Over
Description:
Magic links, those emailed one-time login links, are annoying and inconvenient for folks who use a password manager, but they radically accept some fundamental truths about signing in for everyone else.
By layering passkeys on top of magic links, websites can…
